entity.name: CustomLabelFeature
entity.description: Stores the features users use to custom-label their targets.

entity.name: NamePrefix
entity.description: Stores the prefixes used when naming animals.

entity.name: DeletedObservedValue
entity.description: Alternative for ObservedValue containing extra fields stating when it was deleted and by whom.

field.name: ontologyReference
field.description: (Optional) Reference to the ontology definition or 'code' for this value (recommended for non-numeric values such as codes)

field.name: relation
field.description: Reference to other end of the relationship, if any. For example to a 'brother' or from 'sample' to 'derivedSample'.

field.name: time
field.description: (Optional) Time when the value was observed. For example in time series or if feature is time-dependent like 'age'

field.name: endtime
field.description: (Optional) Time when the value's validity ended

entity.name: DeletedObservationTarget
entity.description: Alternative for ObservationTarget containing extra fields stating when it was deleted and by whom.
